description: The year is 1975 and roller disco is at it’s height! Cute co-eds in short shorts and knee high socks are dancing and skating while their cute feet get drenched in sweaty roller skates! Mark Wood tries to remain cool watching the girls toe loop, catch foot spiral and shoot the ducks until Donna Summer, Rick James and Abba can sing no more. These toe tapping foot brats know the power they have over this foot whore and with each skate pumping lap round the rink put him in a deeper foot fanatic trance until he finds himself face first in sweaty roller skates, dirty cotton socks and twenty adorable little tootsie pop toes. Sweaty sock sniffing, toe sucking, foot worship, lesbian foot sucking, pussy licking, hardcore foot sex, two girl foot job and cum covered toes are all included.
title: Dirty Socks and Roller Skates featuring Chastity Lynn and Lia Lor
